title: EventBridge pipe with SQS as source, lambda as enrichment and API Destination (API Gateway) as target
description: Create an EventBridge pipe to simplify process of pushing items to DynamoDB

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample project demonstrates how to use EventBridge pipe to push and modify messages before sending it to DynamoDB.
This pattern is leveraging EventBridge pipe to first integrate 3 services together, simplifying the process by reducing the need for integration code.
Here, SQS is the EventBridge source and Lambda to enrich the data, before pushing to the target API Destination that invokes an API Gateway.
